content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [taxi_db].[taxi_calls_table]
( 
	[booking_source] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[booking_timestamp] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[day_of_week] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[destination_location] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[driver_id] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[drivers_current_lat] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[drivers_current_lon] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[drivers_location] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[drivers_review] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[estimated_arrival_time_in_m] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[estimated_fare] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[n_passengers] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[order_completion_time] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[passenger_arrival_lat] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[passenger_arrival_lon] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[passenger_current_lat] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[passenger_current_lon] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[passenger_pick_up_time] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[pickup_location] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[status] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[taxi_id] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[time_of_day] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[traffic_conditions] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[trip_distance] [float]  NULL,
	[trip_duration] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[trip_id] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[trip_rating] [float]  NULL,
	[user_id] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[vehicle_details] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[weather_conditions] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[EventProcessedUtcTime] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[PartitionId] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[EventEnqueuedUtcTime] [varchar](50)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [trip_id] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
